snippet: Mikhail Beketov, who was left with disabilities after a brutal beating in 2008, died of heart failure on Monday, his lawyer announced.
abstract: Mikhail Beketov, Russian journalist who became symbol of country's culture of impunity after he was brutally beaten in 2008, has died of heart failure.
lead_paragraph: Mikhail Beketov, who was left with disabilities after a brutal beating in 2008, died of heart failure on Monday, his lawyer announced.

headline.seo: Mikhail Beketov, Russian Journalist Beaten in 2008, Dies
headline.main: Journalist in Russia, Badly Beaten in 2008, Dies
headline.print_headline: Journalist In Russia, Badly Beaten In 2008, Dies

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
